remark.p: Non-career appointee. Under Secretary for Economic Growth, Energy, and the Environment; Assistant Secretary of State for Western Hemisphere Affairs.
Deputy U.S. Coordinator of the Alliance for Progress until June 1965
Assistant Secretary of State for Inter-American Affairs from October 7, 1974 until June 18, 1976; thereafter, Under Secretary of State for Economic Affairs until December 31, 1976

Assistant Secretary of State for Inter-American Affairs from October 7, 1974, until June 18, 1976; Under Secretary of State for Economic and Agricultural Affairs from June 18, 1976, until December 31, 1976
Assistant Secretary of State for Inter-American Affairs from October 1974 until June 1976; Under Secretary of State for Economic Affairs from June until December 1976
Assistant Secretary of State for Inter-American Affairs from October 1974 until June 1976; Under Secretary of State for Economic and Agricultural Affairs from June 1976 until December 1976
Assistant Secretary of State for Inter-American Affairs, from October 1974 until June 1976; Under Secretary of State for Economic Affairs from June until December 1976
Assistant Secretary of State for Inter-American Affairs from October 7, 1974 until June 18, 1976; Under Secretary for Economic Affairs from June 18, 1976 until December 31, 1976

Assistant Secretary of State for Inter-American Affairs from October 7, 1974, until June 18, 1976; Under Secretary for Economic Affairs from June 18, 1976, until December 31, 1976
Assistant Secretary of State for Inter-American Affairs, October 7, 1974–June 18, 1976; Under Secretary for Economic Affairs, June 18, 1976–December 31, 1976
